title: Implement secure user authentication with multi-factor verification
description: As a user, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication, so that my sensitive banking data is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Credentials must be validated securely, and multi-factor methods such as OTPs or authenticator apps should be supported.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Only authenticated users can access the system. 2. Users must complete multi-factor verification to log in.
test_cases: Given a registered user, when they enter their credentials and complete multi-factor verification, then they should be granted access to the system.

title: Ensure secure password management and account recovery
description: As a user, I want secure password management and account recovery options, so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my password.
attributes_and_rules: Implement password complexity requirements, password reset mechanisms, and account recovery through secure channels.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can reset passwords securely. 2. Account recovery processes are secure and comply with regulations.
test_cases: Given a user who has forgotten their password, when they request a password reset, then they should receive a secure method to reset it.

title: Implement session timeout mechanisms
description: As a user, I want my session to time out after inactivity, so that my account remains secure if I forget to log out.
attributes_and_rules: Define session timeout policies and enforce session expiration after a specified period of inactivity.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User sessions expire after a period of inactivity. 2. Users are notified when their session is about to timeout.
test_cases: Given a user is inactive for a specified period, when the timeout limit is reached, then their session should be terminated and they should be logged out.

epic_title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
title: Design and implement role-based access control (RBAC)
description: As a system admin, I want to manage user roles and permissions, so that users can access resources appropriate to their roles.
attributes_and_rules: Implement roles such as customer, relationship manager, and admin, with access levels specific to each.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can be assigned roles with appropriate permissions. 2. Access is restricted based on user roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they log in, then they should only see and access resources their role permits.

epic_title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
title: Include profile management functionality
description: As a customer, I want to manage and update my profile information, so that my details remain current and secure.
attributes_and_rules: Allow users to view and edit their profile information securely.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can update their profile information. 2. Profile changes are saved securely and immediately.
test_cases: Given a user in their profile, when they update their information, then it should be saved and displayed correctly upon subsequent access.

title: Develop a responsive web interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive web interface, so that I can access the banking portal seamlessly across devices.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure the web interface is fully responsive and provides a consistent user experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The interface adapts to various screen sizes. 2. All functionalities remain accessible and usable across devices.
test_cases: Given a user on any device, when they access the portal, then it should display correctly and be fully functional.

title: Implement intuitive navigation and minimize clicks
description: As a user, I want intuitive navigation and minimal clicks, so that I can complete my actions easily and efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Design the interface for intuitive navigation with minimal clicks to complete common actions.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Navigation is logically structured. 2. Common actions require minimal clicks.
test_cases: Given a user, when they navigate the portal, then they should be able to find and execute common actions efficiently.
